about_the_game:
Brief introduction of story

"Rolling east of the Yangtze River, the waves washed away the heroes......" The story of The Three Kingdoms is endless, which is a strategy +RPG type game.
The plot is full of laughter, and takes you back to that era of war, and then shows courage and strategy.
You will command Liu Bei's army to sweep the Central Plains, destroy the Yellow Turban, fight against Dong Zhuo, burn Bowang, the Battle of Chibi, capture Jingzhou, attack Western Shu, and establish The Three Kingdoms.
Then you can use your wisdom and talent to rewrite a unified Central Plains of history, the army to the east, seize Wu land, and then soldiers out of Qishan, march to Luoyang.
It's up to you to decide whether you can change your life and finally rule the world!

Level specification

This game a total of 22 levels, the game is Liu Bei as the commander of the army, other combatants you can choose freely.
When you are in a bloody battle, you must ensure the safety of the life of the manager, once the manager is defeated, you will be wiped out, the GAME OVER.
In each level of the campaign, you can manipulate our entire army, or move, or attack, or use skills, or rest in place.
Improve the character experience, upgrade to a variety of arms, while using the terrain, set superior forces, fight all the way, when the victory conditions can be met.

Service introduction

This game character arms are divided into soldiers and civilian two categories. They will continuously increase their experience in battle to improve to
The senior arms. There are 32 classes, each with advantages, such as fast action, strong attack, high defense, active skills, and so on.

Attached is a transfer chart




Freedom specification

Each upgrade is free to select attributes to add points
You are free to choose advanced careers with each transfer
You can also choose your skills when you change jobs
Build the strongest fighter in your mind with the freedom to choose from classes, skills, and stat points
In addition, our military characters have their own weapons, which can be obtained by completing specific tasks, giving your general the icing on the cake.
